entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
